Package org.apache.commons.jocl

Java Object Configuration Language, an XML application for describing Java Objects to be instantiated.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConstructorUtil Miscellaneous Constructor related utility functions.
JOCLContentHandler A ContentHandler for the Java Object Configuration Language.
 

Package org.apache.commons.jocl Description

Java Object Configuration Language, an XML application for describing Java Objects to be instantiated. See JOCLContentHandler.
